#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
             string a,b;
             int t;
             scanf("%d",&t);
             while(t--)
             {
                          cin>>a>>b;
                          size_t found=a.find(b);
                          if(found!=string::npos)
                          {
                                       printf("1\n");
                          }
                          else
                                       printf("0\n");
             }
             return 0;
}
